#line 1 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/24_PartialBlending/Shaders/D3D12/plane.vert"
#line 27 "C:/Users/conno/Desktop/The-Forge/Examples_3/Unit_Tests/src/24_PartialBlending/Shaders/D3D12/plane.vert"
cbuffer uniformBlock : register(b0,  space3 )
{
    float4x4 mvp;
    float4x4 toWorld;
};

struct VSInput
{
  float4 Position : POSITION;
  float2 TexCoord : TEXCOORD0;
};

struct VSOutput {
	float4 Position : SV_POSITION;
  float2 TexCoord : TEXCOORD;
};

VSOutput main(VSInput input)
{
	  VSOutput result;
    float4x4 tempMat = mul(mvp, toWorld);
    result.Position = mul(tempMat, input.Position);

    result.TexCoord = input.TexCoord;

  	return result;
}
